belongs_to_collection.name: The Rocky Horror Picture Show Collection

response.overview: Sweethearts Brad and Janet, stuck with a flat tire during a storm, discover the eerie mansion of Dr. Frank-N-Furter, a transvestite scientist. As their innocence is lost, Brad and Janet meet a houseful of wild characters, including a rocking biker and a creepy butler. Through elaborate dances and rock songs, Frank-N-Furter unveils his latest creation: a muscular man named 'Rocky'.
response.title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show

titles.title: El Show de terror de Rocky
